calcFSF¶

deblend.calcFSF(a, b, beta, listLambda, center=(12, 12), shape=(25, 25), dim='MUSE')[source]¶

Build list of FSF images (np arrays) from parameters a,b and beta. fwhm=a+b*lmbda, and beta is the Moffat parameter.
